helpCommand: ‚Ñπ Help
Tipping bot for Trust Wallet and all Binance Chain tokens
/start ‚Äî Start dialog with Bot
/help ‚Äî This help menu
Commands for common chats (only for chat Admins):
NOTE: before using this commands - first link your wallet to Bot through the private chat and select Token for use with commands
/token - show Token, which will be used in all commands
( it's a good practice to check selected Token before calling other commands )
( you can use / token command in group chat to instantly change your default token: /token TWT - to set TWT )
/zzstat - show some common statistics
( Usage: /zzstat or /zzstat TWT - stat for TWT token )
( or /zzstat BNB - stat for BNB token )
/zztip - tip user
( Usage: /zztip @toUserName value )
( Usage in "Reply" message: /zztip value )
/zzgiveaway - Giveaway coins in a group to first who claim
( Usage: /zzgiveaway value )
( every user can Claim once in 24h )
/zzgiveauto - Auto create Giveaway with time interval (in Hours)
( Usage: /zzgiveauto each-time-value interval)
( giveauto will be stopped if not enough coins )
/zzgivestop - command to STOP /zzgiveauto
/zzrain - spread some N coins among X users
( Usage: /zzrain value NUMBER_of_Users )
( instead of NUMBER_of_Users may use ALL or MAX replacement - to use all available users of current chat )
( if value param is omitted - default Rain value will be used )
( function can take a long time )
/zztweet or /zztwit - start monitoring of retweets
( Usage: /zztweet value tweet_URL - monitor tweet_URL with target retweets count set to VALUE )
( value is not mandatory. So /zztweet tweet_URL - will also work )
( if tweet is already monitored - current retweets count will be shown )
( tweet ID (number) can be used instead of full URL )
/zzrtrain - similar to RAIN but with retweets check
( Usage: /zzrtrain value tweet_URL )
( only those users, who linked their tip bot's account with Twitter and retweeted the Tweet will receive Rain )
( if value param is omitted - default Rain value will be used )
